items.title: Cut Through the Noise, Do What Matters
items.author: Adrian Schmidt
items.summary:
- Focus over constant discipline; frame India's mobility as ground scarcity with abundant airspace, advocating sky-based mobility as a scalable global strategy and protecting core priorities.
- Founder's twofold role: secure capital for uninterrupted engineering time and build trust-aligned systems with every task having an owner; avoid superficial activity that doesn't move the mission.
- Eliminate noise unless it advances the mission; practice rest and morning clarity to beat decision fatigue; Jobs/Bezos quotes underline stubborn vision with flexibility on details.
